title: Tianchu Miaoxiang Vegetarian - Chaowai
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Chinese, Fast food, Take-out
description: Founded in 2003 and has another branch in Tsinghua, this place offers an extensive vegetarian menu including a variety of mockmeat dishes. Organizes monthly free vegetarian cooking training salon. Directions: 300 meters west of JingGuang Center at East 3rd Ring, next to Central Park and Vantone Center. Take exit A of Jintai Xizhao station on subway line 10, turn right at first light, then turn left on first light, walk 200m to see Chaowai SOHO building.
streetAddress: Rm 0260, 2/F, Bldg D, Chaowai SOHO, 6B Chaoyangmenwai Dajie, CBD/Guomao
